body.p:
(Also marked as Hadfield)
Samuel Hatfield was born in 1793 in Powell Valley, Lee County, Virginia. Enlisted in the Navy at Annapolis on May 24, 1813 and fought in the War of 1812. Fought at the Battle of Lake Erie, September 10, 1813, near Put-In-Bay, Ohio, under Commodore Perry. Moved to Floyd County, Kentucky after the war. Married Mary Franklin on April 28, 1815 in Floyd County. Died in 1874 in Bradley, Floyd County, Kentucky.
